Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 42nd overall pick, by Northeastern in 1973...
Traded from Northeastern to Boston (FBA) on 3/2/1973 (Going to SHP: P D. Wallace. Going to NE: P J. Bradford)...
Earned first career win on 9/21/1978...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1980...
Injured on 5/2/1981 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/4/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/10/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $1,331,000 per year...
Released by Plum Grove on 6/9/1986...
